Let's learn what different TV shows are called.
The soap opera, "Days of Our Lives," started in 1965.
Watching cooking shows makes me hungry.
I often get my news from CNN.
"Tom and Jerry" was my favorite cartoon when I was a kid.
I watch football games on a sports channel.
"Grizzly Man" is a documentary about bears.
"The Bachelor" is a popular reality TV show.
Millions of young people watched the sitcom, "Friends."
I watch Jimmy Fallon's talk show because he's funny.
You must be smart to win in game shows like "Jeopardy."
